ComicInfo.Summary: "The Flying Shoes Incident" plus our usual assortment of action, romance, laffs and wacky hijinks. Featuring: Savage Dragon! Smasher! Angel! Mister Glum! The Liberty League! Plus a special surprise mystery villain! A nice self-contained-issue and a great jumping on place for new readers.
